Package org.moera.lib.node.types.principal

Class PrincipalExpression

java.lang.Object
org.moera.lib.node.types.principal.PrincipalExpression
All Implemented Interfaces:
PrincipalFilter
public final class PrincipalExpression extends Object implements PrincipalFilter
Represents a logical expression based on principals. This class supports combining principals through logical operations such as AND, OR, and NOT. It can be used to define complex logical filters involving principals.

    • includes

      public boolean includes(boolean admin, String nodeName, boolean subscribed, String[] friendGroups)
      Evaluates whether a client the given privileges satisfy the conditions of this PrincipalExpression.
      Specified by:
      includes in interface PrincipalFilter
      Parameters:
      admin - specifies whether the client has administrative privileges
      nodeName - the name of the client's node
      subscribed - specifies if the current node is subscribed to the client's node
      friendGroups - an array of friend groups that the client's node belongs to
      Returns:
      true if the parameters satisfy the conditions of the PrincipalExpression; otherwise false
      Throws:
      InvalidPrincipalExpression - if the logical operation or its operands are not properly set
